TopicTitle: Delete tech tree and start over with module manager?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

 

I've created my own tech tree for KSP 1.1 some time ago using module manager. Starting with this code to delete all tech tree nodes to create it completely new from scratch. 

@TechTree {

            !RDNode,*

                   {

                   }

........

This doesn't seem to work anymore in 1.12.5. (Maybe even since a long long time)

Is There a way to sill do so? I've checked some other tech tree mods and none of these deletes the tree anymore but instead moves, alters and renames existing nodes, which is much more complicated and doesnt really fit my plans. 

Thanks!

Edited September 28, 2023 by Kergarin
